name: GB Conte - Delirio
text:
video work I directed and produced in 2022.
for the swiss-italian artist GB Conte.
shot in the la vela di calatrava near rome.
in collaboration with farbfilm.ch

name: Verzasca in Red
text:
first short film I did in 2020.
opening film at the swiss jugendfilmtage 2021.
shown in cambridge, rome, paris, munich, zug and zurich.
award winning at the new york indie cinema awards, in the categories cinematography (alvaro kreyden) and edit (hanna lea wyttenbach)
